4305550.name: Rockwell's Zen Tiles
4305550.description:
A relaxing puzzle journey around the world

Rockwell has spent a lifetime chasing mice, squirrels, and anything else that dared cross his yard.
Now? He’s tired. And he’s ready to slow down.

Rockwell’s Zen Tiles is a calm, cozy tile-clearing puzzle game about travel, relaxation, and taking things one thoughtful move at a time. Visit beautiful locations around the world, listen to soothing music, and gently clear tiles to help Rockwell unwind and enjoy the scenery.

There’s no rush. No timers. Just peaceful puzzles and a dog who’s finally learning how to relax.

How It Works

Clear lines of tiles to advance time and progress through each location.

  • Clear one line to move forward

  • Clear multiple lines at once to earn an Undo, letting you step back and rethink a move

  • Clear the entire board to earn a special bonus

Strategic play is rewarded, but mistakes are never punished. Zen Tiles is about flow, not pressure.

Travel the World

Each country features five unique locations, each with its own atmosphere and mood.
Clear enough lines to move Rockwell forward in time — and onward to the next destination.

As you travel:

  • Unlock new locations

  • Collect rewards

  • Watch Rockwell settle in, relax, and enjoy the moment

It’s a journey measured in calm progress, not high scores.

Designed to Relax

Every location pairs gentle visuals with carefully chosen background music.
You can mute the music at any time — or let it wash over you while you play.

This is a game meant to be played:

  • after a long day

  • with a cup of tea

  • or while your brain quietly unwinds

Features

  • Relaxing tile-clearing puzzle gameplay

  • Undo rewards for thoughtful multi-line clears

  • Full board clear bonuses

  • Time-based progression instead of stress or timers

  • Visit countries and multiple locations around the world

  • Cozy visuals and calming soundscapes

  • A very good dog learning how to rest
